actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Science and Technology.

summary.text: Appropriates $599,472 for the House Committee on Science and Technology. Directs that not to exceed $86,500 of the total amount provided by this resolution may be used to procure the services of consultants. Prohibits the use of funds authorized by this resolution for expenditure in connection with the study or investigation of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other committee of the House.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Science and Technology.
